title: The logon server did not respond . You may have trouble connecting to the server unrelated to League
body: Anyone know how to fix it ?

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having some trouble connecting to our authentication servers.  If you're still experiencing this, go over our [connection issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide and follow each step to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any issues afterwards!
